As darkfate continued to gain control of the trainer base, the red 
chaochitan ball surrounding Hellpeon insensified greatly, the size of 
it having engulfed half the hallway he is one, half of the one above 
him, half of the one below him and a great deal of the next hallways 
in front or behind him. THe ball continued to grow still as six more 
beams escaped it and flew through the trainer base to colledie with 
more rooms and walls. As this happened Darkfate soon recieved a 
telepathic message from Hellpeon.

Hellpeon: "YOur men... out now... people in are out now... This base 
will be destroyed once the energy i sufficient in the orb."
